name: Unity3D Night and Day Demo
description:
Unity3D Night and Day Cycle

This is a personal non-monetary project with study purposes. Open Source, feel free to ask anything or use any code. What as the days pass and your mind go with it. Take some time to meditate and relax.

Software

Made with Unity3D 2022.1.0a13 Scripts made with C#

For the codes and Unity project for study feel free to access:

 JpBaraky/Unity3DDay-NightCycle (github.com)
